name: El Septimo - Alexandra Collection - Marilyn
additionalNotes: El Septimo Geneva S.A. has announced a new two-size line that the company says is targeted at female cigar smokers. According to the company, the Coco uses two ligeros, six secos and one volado while the Marylin uses two ligeros, four secos and a ligero. The tobacco is grown near San José, Costa Rica on a mountain at 2,000 meters of elevation. The company says that the tobacco is aged between 5-15 years.
